title: Probe
description: Defines the location and description of a probe. Upon execution ( HTTP GET ) defines the state of the probe.

code.description: software facing value that uniquely identifies the probe

name.description: human readable string describing the probe's purpose

description.description: details from the probe that may help users understand the health of an endpoint

remarks.description: details of the error that may help users solve the problem

self.description: system function identifying a unique system owned resource as a URL

status.description: usually used bottom probe but may also be returned by api or application specific probes

when.description: origination date and time of probe execution

itemCount.description: number of things in the items collection

items.description: one or more things a buyer wishes a seller to provide
